channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @tribelaw "they" can force you to have a child you don't want.
item.source:markdown: @tribelaw "they" can force you to have a child you don't want.

item.description: @apollozac they can have him!
item.source:markdown: @apollozac they can have him!

item.description:
Listen up schmucks.

See this picture of Trump and his buddies from Russia.

That's who he is.

You sure you want that guy to have American secrets in his hotel safe? https://t.co/hHLpNuTrW4

Oh one more thing.

Before you feel any sympathy for the schmuck in the middle, he's the one that appointed the Supreme Court justices that overturned Roe v Wade.

So if you like him, you're supporting the enslavement of human broodmares aka women.
item.source:markdown:
Listen up schmucks.
See this picture of Trump and his buddies from Russia.
That's who he is.
You sure you want that guy to have American secrets in his hotel safe? https://t.co/hHLpNuTrW4
Oh one more thing.
Before you feel any sympathy for the schmuck in the middle, he's the one that appointed the Supreme Court justices that overturned Roe v Wade.
So if you like him, you're supporting the enslavement of human broodmares aka women.

item.description: Andrew Cuomo (remember him?) now just in an instant went into my "schmuck pile." https://t.co/9uHhXl4Dup
item.source:markdown: Andrew Cuomo (remember him?) now just in an instant went into my "schmuck pile." https://t.co/9uHhXl4Dup

item.description: @UncannyRobot I think out of deference they would use Gitmo. https://t.co/MRTSHe1Vcn
item.source:markdown: @UncannyRobot I think out of deference they would use Gitmo. https://t.co/MRTSHe1Vcn

item.description: Last night's Better Call Saul was fantastic.
item.source:markdown: Last night's Better Call Saul was fantastic.

item.description: @jeffjarvis I unfollowed him after this stunt.
item.source:markdown: @jeffjarvis I unfollowed him after this stunt.

item.description: I think it's great they searched Trump's house. Now I hope they lock him up. That would be most awesome.
item.source:markdown: I think it's great they searched Trump's house. Now I hope they lock him up. That would be most awesome.

item.description: @AndrewYang FWIW -- this is when I unfollowed you.
item.source:markdown: @AndrewYang FWIW -- this is when I unfollowed you.

item.description: What did Trump have in his safe that the FBI wanted?
item.source:markdown: What did Trump have in his safe that the FBI wanted?

item.description: Sure enough when you search for “albuquerque conman” you get Saul Goodman. https://t.co/oJ1T5fXA9L
item.source:markdown: Sure enough when you search for “albuquerque conman” you get Saul Goodman. https://t.co/oJ1T5fXA9L

item.description: Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks. Trump sucks.

item.description: Poor Donald Trump. He has a boo-boo.
item.source:markdown: Poor Donald Trump. He has a boo-boo.

item.description: Trump sucks.
item.source:markdown: Trump sucks.

item.description: Trial seeks to develop first Lyme disease vaccine in 2 decades. https://t.co/9gTeOp8Qvo

item.description: FBI executes search warrant at Trump's Mar-a-Lago. https://t.co/Ioj3bHJMIb
item.source:markdown: FBI executes search warrant at Trump's Mar-a-Lago. https://t.co/Ioj3bHJMIb

item.description:
@blogisch @ton_zylstra yes, that would definitely be something to work on once there's a network of people organized like this.

that's the hard part in my experience. ;-)

people who use products like @logseq or @roamresearch like graphs made of outlines.
Don't read this with a mouthful of coffee. https://t.co/pP0T87fMOz
item.source:markdown: Don't read this with a mouthful of coffee. https://t.co/pP0T87fMOz

item.description:
@jeffjarvis @joncoopertweets They should go to Hungary or Russia.

There are a lot of minorities in Texas and we can't let the white people in Texas ruin their lives.
item.source:markdown:
@jeffjarvis @joncoopertweets They should go to Hungary or Russia.
There are a lot of minorities in Texas and we can't let the white people in Texas ruin their lives.

item.description: @blogisch @ton_zylstra i don't know. why do you want to do it?
item.source:markdown: @blogisch @ton_zylstra i don't know. why do you want to do it?

item.description: Olivia Newton John, singer and actress, dead at 73. https://t.co/8bvs5xy3gs
item.source:markdown: Olivia Newton John, singer and actress, dead at 73. https://t.co/8bvs5xy3gs

item.description: @danmactough i did that yesterday with deGrom, he had a perfect game going in the 5th inning. as soon as i did, he walked the next batter and the one after that hit a home run and they took him out of the game.
item.source:markdown: @danmactough i did that yesterday with deGrom, he had a perfect game going in the 5th inning. as soon as i did, he walked the next batter and the one after that hit a home run and they took him out of the game.

item.description: @ton_zylstra yes.
item.source:markdown: @ton_zylstra yes.

item.description:
@ton_zylstra that's why i was asking the context. in some situations it will iterate. but i'm not even sure there are any in drummer. maybe searching? i don't know.

@ton_zylstra anyway if it were to start looping infinitely eventually it would fail, you could just close the tab and try again.
item.source:markdown:
@ton_zylstra that's why i was asking the context. in some situations it will iterate. but i'm not even sure there are any in drummer. maybe searching? i don't know.
@ton_zylstra anyway if it were to start looping infinitely eventually it would fail, you could just close the tab and try again.

item.description:
@DonLew87 @dawnjurgensen Lock em up! That's what the laws are there for.

All the news people say oh it's going to be terrible when the trumps are secretary of state. they're subject to the same laws we all are. if they break them, send em to jail. https://t.co/H2WTF1JNPA
item.source:markdown:
@DonLew87 @dawnjurgensen Lock em up! That's what the laws are there for.
All the news people say oh it's going to be terrible when the trumps are secretary of state. they're subject to the same laws we all are. if they break them, send em to jail. https://t.co/H2WTF1JNPA
